Download Game!

[Introduction]
Fighting flash game based on hokuto no ken (fist of north star).

[Controls]
PLAYER 1:
move right= F
move Left = S
down = D
jump = E
low punch = G
high punch = H
low kick = B
high kick = N

PLAYER 2 :
move right= right arrow
move Left = left arrow
down = down arrow
jump = up arrow
low punch = I
high punch = O
low kick = K
high kick = L

[About]
Developer: FlashKOF
Links: http://flashkof.fr/hokuto/index.html
